Introduction

Hong Jin Young is a South Korean trot singer currently under IMH Entertainment. She is a former member of the girl group SWAN and project girl group Unnies.

She made her solo debut on June 19, 2009, with the digital single "Love Battery".

On September 19, 2019, she withdrew her application for contract termination after coming to an agreement with Music K. It was revealed on October 30 that she had set up her own one-man agency called IMH Entertainment and was preparing for a comeback.
